Metadata.title: FieldSense Agro
Metadata.description: GIS-based, mobile-first production and profitability controlling for agriculture

Dashboard.description: Here's a quick overview of your farm's performance.
Dashboard.performanceDescription: Your cost and revenue overview for the current year.
Dashboard.recentActivitiesDescription: An overview of the latest logged activities.

FieldsPage.title: Fields
FieldsPage.description: Manage your field boundaries and view GIS data.
FieldsPage.comingSoonDescription: An interactive map to view and select your fields, import GIS data, and overlay observation information will be available here.

MachineryPage.title: Machinery
MachineryPage.description: Manage your fleet of tractors, harvesters, and other equipment.
MachineryPage.name: Name

ObservationsPage.title: Observations
ObservationsPage.description: Document crop growth, damages, and other field observations.
ObservationsPage.comingSoonDescription: The tool for geo-referenced documentation of field observations, including attaching photos and notes, will be available here.

OperationsPage.title: Operations
OperationsPage.description: Log all production measures and resource usage.
OperationsPage.comingSoonDescription: The mobile-first interface to efficiently capture all production measures (e.g., tillage, seeding, harvesting) will be available here.

ReportsPage.title: Reports
ReportsPage.description: Analyze costs, contribution margins, and overall performance.
ReportsPage.comingSoonDescription: Dashboards and reports for transparent insights into full costs, contribution margins, labor hours, and machinery costs will be available here.

SettingsPage.title: Settings
SettingsPage.description: Manage master data, user roles, and system configurations.
SettingsPage.comingSoonDescription: Configuration for master data (crops, materials, prices), user permissions, and other system-wide settings will be available here.
